message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business. Given its high value and exceptional quality, it is worth $12000 to us. Considering its immense worth to both us and potential buyers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you to acquire this product at a special price of $10500. This is a unique opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Should you choose to accept this offer, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction promptly. Thank you for considering our proposal.
